content: Award The **Pingat Pentadbiran Awam** (**Tentera**) (English: Public Administration Medal (Military)) is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to members of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) for meritorious service in command or staff positions, and has three grades: - Emas (Gold) - Perak (Silver) (Bar) - Perak (Silver) - Gangsa (Bronze) Recipients are entitled to use the post-nominal letters **PPA**, and may include the grade in brackets - e.g.: PPA(E). The [Pingat Pentadbiran Awam](/wiki/Pingat_Pentadbiran_Awam) is the civil equivalent award. ## Description - The ribbon is red with two white edge stripes. - World Medals PPA page This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article related to [orders](/wiki/Order_(distinction)), [decorations](/wiki/Award), and [medals](/wiki/Medal) is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pingat Pentadbiran Awam (Tentera)
